definition: to circle/to go back/to turn around/to answer/to return/to revolve/Hui ethnic group (Chinese Muslims)/time/classifier for acts of a play/section or chapter (of a classic book)
to visit/to call on/to seek/to inquire/to investigate

sentences.english: Patients in both groups re-occur without intraoperative awareness.
sentences.chinese: 两组患者术后回访无术中知晓发生。

sentences.english: Following Nixon's visit to China, the Chinese team came to the United States.
sentences.chinese: 尼克松访华后，中国乒乓球队回访了美国。

sentences.english: I paid Mr. and Mrs. Smith a return visit yesterday afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天下午回访了史密斯夫妇。

sentences.english: Schedule additional rechecks as needed, until the infection is clear.
sentences.chinese: 如果需要，建立回访，直到感染被清除。

sentences.english: Your patron planet comes home for a visit, starting this afternoon.
sentences.chinese: 你的守护星将于今日中午回访。

sentences.english: On succeeding visits we brought plumber's candles.
sentences.chinese: 我们在以后的回访中，带上了管子工用的蜡烛。

sentences.english: But, when the researchers followed up the same people 3 years later, these effects had disappeared (Kraut et al., 2002).
sentences.chinese: 但当研究者3年后回访时，症状消失了。

sentences.english: But I mean, if you launch a feature, obviously retention is going to go up.
sentences.chinese: 如果你推广一个新功能，回访率就会上升。

sentences.english: The number of call back attempts is an important determinant of response rates and nonresponse error.
sentences.chinese: 回访的次数是回复率和无回复误差的重要决定因素。

sentences.english: Years later, the Cuban minister paid a return visit.
When someone reciprocates, treat it as a gift and thank them.
sentences.chinese: 当有人回访时，把它视为一份小礼物并感谢他们。

sentences.english: The cocking handle is attached to the right side of the bolt carrier and reciprocates when gun is fired.
sentences.chinese: 在握把附于承运人的螺栓和右侧的回访时，枪开火。

sentences.english: If you have good content, people will always come back for more.
sentences.chinese: 如果你有好的内容，人们会更多的回访。

sentences.english: Sometimes that will mean surveying old customers.
sentences.chinese: 有时候需要回访你的老客户。

sentences.english: This keeps your users happy and more likely to return.
sentences.chinese: 这些都可以使你的用户愉快，也更加有可能回访。

sentences.english: To organize the quality re-visiting, and furnish first rate service for the company.
sentences.chinese: 组织工程质量的回访工作，为公司提供一流的服务。

definition: (Tw) to make a telephone call (generally as a representative of a company, school or agency etc, to an individual, often for the purpose of conducting a survey) (abbr. for 電話訪問|电话访问)
to refer sb to an agency (or hospital etc)/referral
to have an informal discussion/CL:次[ci4],個|个[ge4]
to seek by inquiry or search/to call on/to visit
to make secret inquiries/to investigate in secret
to accompany/(of a doctor etc) to do a follow-up (on a patient, client etc)
at set dates/at regular intervals/periodic/limited to a fixed period of time/fixed term
to have a clear view (of a situation)/to fish for information/fact-finding
